body:
Hey doods! I've been playing avicus for like 8 months now and I'm approaching the point where I want to interact more with other gamers.
 
Below are some questions...
  1. Would anybody like to record with me sometime for youtube?
  2.  Does anyone have a spare place in a clan for me?!
  3. Anyone just wanna play with me on skype?
  4. Does anyone recommend TS?
Cheers guys! <3

title: I really want a clan!'<3

replies.body:
TS really helps in getting to know people even though some of the people there can be really immature. I got into Phoenix (RIP) by talking to spicy on TS.
TL;DR Use TS

replies.body: TeamSpeak is good if you wish to interact a bit more with the community.
replies.body_tagged: TeamSpeak is good if you wish to interact a bit more with the community.

replies.body: Yeah I'm getting It now P.S. I know there's like 500 ppl on avicus at a time, do they all use it and does it get crowded?
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I'm getting It now P.S. I know there's like 500 ppl on avicus at a time, do they all use it and does it get crowded?

replies.body: TS doesn't really get all that crowded besides when there are large community events.

reply_to.body: Yeah I'm getting It now P.S. I know there's like 500 ppl on avicus at a time, do they all use it and does it get crowded?
reply_to.body_tagged: Yeah I'm getting It now P.S. I know there's like 500 ppl on avicus at a time, do they all use it and does it get crowded?

replies.body:
On peak hours such as weekends and holidays, there is most likely one channel with 10-20 people in it.

However, there are many other channels with less amounts of players, as well as donor suites.
